segments.text: I see the woman is completely focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even realize the water is flooding the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is going to get soaked if she doesn’t move soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, but I can’t blame them for wanting cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is wobbling, and the boy is stretching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and knock everything over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, unlike this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should probably warn them, but it’s kind of funny to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
